prompt: <description>Part 1: Rectangular Prism Sketch Begin by creating a new coordinate system. Set the euler angles to [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] and the translation vector to [0.0001, 0.5633, 0.0]. Create the first face of the sketch. 1. Draw a line from point (0.07, 0.0) to point (0.6798, 0.0). 2. Draw an arc from point (0.6798, 0.0) to point (0.6798, 0.1401) with mid point at (0.7499, 0.0701). 3. Draw a line from point (0.6798, 0.1401) to point (0.0774, 0.1397). 4. Draw an arc from point (0.0774, 0.1397) to point (0.07, 0.0) with mid point at (0.0, 0.0738). Extrusion Extrude the sketch using a depth of 0.1261, with no extrusion in the opposite direction. Scale the sketch by 0.7499. This will create a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a slightly tapered top. Part 2: Cylindrical Object Sketch Create a new coordinate system. Set the euler angles to [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] and the translation vector to [0.0239, 0.4372, 0.0334]. Create the first face of the sketch. 1. Draw a circle with center at (0.0367, 0.0367) and radius 0.0367. Create the second face of the sketch. 1. Draw a circle with center at (0.259, 0.0367) and radius 0.0263. Extrusion Extrude the first face of the sketch using a depth of 0.4372, with no extrusion in the opposite direction. Scale the sketch by 0.2853. This will create a cylindrical object with a smaller cylinder attached to one end. The larger cylinder has a flat surface on one side and the smaller cylinder has a rounded end. The object is symmetrical along the axis of the larger cylinder. The height, width, and length of each of the intermediate parts and the final shape are: * Part 1: height 0.7499, width 0.1261, length 0.7499. * Part 2: height 0.2853, width 0.4372, length 0.2853. * Final shape: height 0.7499, width 0.4372, length 0.7499.</description>

Draw a 2D sketch on the X-Y plane of the new coordinate system. 3. Create the first loop (loop_1) with the following curves: - line_1: Start Point (0.0, 0.0), End Point (0.7059, 0.0) - line_2: Start Point (0.7059, 0.0), End Point (0.7059, 0.7059) - line_3: Start Point (0.7059, 0.7059), End Point (0.0, 0.7059) - line_4: Start Point (0.0, 0.7059), End Point (0.0, 0.0) 4. Extrude the 2D sketch along the normal direction by 0.5735 units and opposite normal direction by 0 units to create the three-dimensional rectangular prism. This part has a length of 0.7059 units, a width of 0.7059 units, and a height of 0.5735 units. The next part will be constructed based on this part using the provided operation.</description>
